name: Custom Vinyl Toy Cartoon Caricature
description:
Do you love vinyl toys and action figures? 
Or know someone who loves collecting them?

With LiLMEEZ, you can turn yourself or anyone into a cute, unique toy cartoon!

Just email me with a few pictures of the person, and I will put your toy into production in my "Cartoon Factory" ;)

Your cartoon will be sent to your email as a 7x5 JPG image. These are high-resolution 300dpi images suitable for printing and framing.

*This is a digital image only and not an actual toy.

Important: 
Send reference images along with your order number and the name to go on the box to: heycartoonme@gmail.com
